result.text:
#JustIn  Chinese President Xi Jinping said on Wednesday that China is ready to invite 50,000 young Americans to China on exchange and study programs in the next five years to increase exchanges between the two peoples, especially between the youth.

Xi made the announcement at a welcome dinner by friendly organizations in the United States.

result.text: At the Filoli summit meeting with @POTUS Biden, President Xi Jinping noted that the China-US relationship, the most important bilateral relationship in the world, should be perceived and envisioned in the broad context of the accelerating global transformations unseen in a century. It should develop in a way that benefits our two peoples and fulfills our responsibility for human progress.
